## SourceMapping interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Source mapping information from an input processor. Maps symbol names to their source locations for diagnostic positioning.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface SourceMapping 
```

</td><td>

Map&lt;string, [SourceLocation](./change-detector-core.sourcelocation.md)<!-- -->&gt;


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** Maps symbol name to its source location in the input file. The key should match the symbol name in the ProcessResult.symbols map.
